lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Lawrence. Larry Newman, 76, passed away on March 16, 2016 in Santa Fe, New Mexico. A longtime resident of New York, Larry, together with close friend, Bill Stein, founded Newman-Stein, Inc., a successful consumer research firm. Larry enjoyed sports, theatre, ballet, opera and the diverse cultural bustle of New York City. He was an insatiable and extensive reader, a passionate and eclectic music lover, a world traveler, and before there were "foodies," Larry became an accomplished culinarian. But most importantly, Larry was kind and generous. Survived by his wife, Sandy, of 48 years, he will be missed. Donations to the charity of your choice in Larry's honor are appreciated. 1/3
